Review Title: Bad company, does not treat it's employees with respect
Pros: Only good thing was the monthly pay
Cons:
Was approached to join the company with the promise that the position is a permanent role with a minimum 1 year with the client. Was also told that they have many clients to move us around to should contract end with clients.

All lies as was terminated within a week of joining when client and Optimum could not agree to extend the contract (contract with client was not in fact a year as promised when joining). 

Company did not bother to look for other clients for the team to join and just terminated us and wanted us to finish the project in the 1 month notice.

Was not treated fairly or with any respect throughout the whole thing.

No bonus, below average annual leaves, basic insurance for employees.

Review Title: A Testament to Exceptional Company Quality - Joined Back Again!
Pros: 1 ) Optimum Solutions consistently fosters growth, development, and strong relationships among employees. 2 ) The company greets returning employees with open arms, making them feel valued and providing a genuine sense of belonging. 3 ) The HR team ensures a smooth transition and offers necessary resources for effective reintegration. 4 ) Optimum Solutions prioritizes maintaining strong connections with employees, ensuring their well-being and happiness. 5 ) The company's culture promotes teamwork, collaboration, and innovation, creating a positive work environment. 6 ) The open-door policy and approachability of the management team enhance employee empowerment and a sense of being heard. 7 ) Optimum Solutions invests in employees through continuous learning, training programs, and career advancement prospects. 8 ) The company's dedication to fostering talent inspires creativity and productivity among employees.
Cons: 1 ) The rapid pace at Optimum Solutions may require high adaptability and multitasking skills. 2 ) While growth and development opportunities are available, they may be more accessible in certain departments or roles. 3 ) Achieving a healthy work-life balance may require proactive self-management due to occasional demands for extra hours or tight deadlines. 4 ) Like any organization, occasional communication gaps or misunderstandings among team members may arise.

Pros: I have a total 7 plus years of experience in the service based companies in coding and development activities. It has been 9 months since I have joined with optimum solutions. Throughout this 7 months what I find the best comparing to the other service based companies are 1) Direct interaction with the client as we are part of the client team directly working remote from India which reduces the management layers improvising the quality of work, visibility and communication. 2) Interaction with the leadership team/group knowing how the company heightening, strategies to manage the clients which helps in growth of my career.
Cons: The feedback from the client which are shared between the client and the company can be shared as a feedback for respective employees which will be helpful in developing the individual. HRBP is taking care of it in recent days which I see more helpful.

Cons: A small body shopping company hiding as a projects company. This company does only people selling to clients. Yes many others and even big compnaies also do that but the motive of this company is to give people on project then when over just fire them. When client gives project end notice then company gives exit notice. They dont prepare us for new skills. They dont try other projects for us. If we ask they say some excuse. How many times I asked my account manager for next project and he said to wait. Then one day I am asked to leave the company. Very very bad experience.

Pros: 12 days of AL, with little to almost no benefits. Kept mentioning about being an open organization so that u can feedback to them regarding anything. Dont expect much for pay increment because they will give u bare minimum at 3% max, with barely any bonus citing company performance due to covid. Lousy manager that does not even bother to what u have to say. Does not know what the team is doing. Any problems u re basically on your own as he will ask u to check with yr team mates instead. Basically, people are there because they cannot get a work pass outside. Exit interview only conducted as a process. They dont really care what u have to say
Cons: Management not receptive Low pay, no benefits (dental, flexi), low bonus
